item.title: How to change drop and add to a store
item.dc:creator: @l.w41sh l.w41sh
item.description:
@l.w41sh wrote:

I know that basically all servers are different but could someone tell me where I would find the file with the NPC store items. And where the NPC drops are?

I would like to be able to add some items to these two things for my players.
It would also be helpful if someone could include a example of a code if I need a large about of text in my coding.

public class NPCDrops {
public int DropType;
public int[] Items = new int[100];
public int[] ItemsN = new int[100];
public int npcId;

public NPCDrops(int _npcId) {
	npcId = _npcId;
	for (int i = 0; i < Items.length; i++) {
		Items[i] = -1;
		ItemsN[i] = 0;
	}
}

}

What does this look like???

Read full topic
item.source: How to change drop and add to a store
